Class Content2HTMLPage

java.lang.Object
com.opensymphony.sitemesh.compatability.Content2HTMLPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
HTMLPage, Page
public class Content2HTMLPage extends Object implements HTMLPage
Adapts a SiteMesh 3 Content to a SiteMesh 2 HTMLPage.
Since:
SiteMesh 3
Author:
Joe Walnes
